    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ArrowPanel
    ArrowPanel is a custom Swing panel used in the stock market simulation GUI.
    BasicStatistic
     
    Buyer
    The Buyer class represents a simulated market participant with decision-making logic based on market trends, trust levels, and activity.
    BuyerFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of Buyer with customized attributes.
    BuyerStatsPanel
    BuyerStatsPanel is a Swing-based UI panel that displays detailed statistics for individual buyers in a stock market simulation.
    Candle
    Represents a single candlestick in a financial chart.
    CustomWindowPanel
    CustomWindowPanel is a Swing component that provides a borderless window with a custom title bar and support for minimize, fullscreen toggle, and close buttons.
    FloatWorkerStatistic
    Use this as a general class for holding Float-based statistics.
    Main
    The main class is responsible for the testing.
    MarketObserver
    Interface for observers that want to be notified about changes in the market state.
    Matrix
    The class that is responsible for running the simulation.
    RandomBuyer
    RandomBuyer is a type of Buyer that makes decisions to buy, sell, or hold at random.
    ResizeListener
    ResizeListener provides manual resizing capability for an undecorated JFrame.
    Robot
    Example class that implements the Skeleton.Unit abstract class.
    ScrollingNews
    Represents a single scrolling news message in the stock market UI.
    SimulatedTradePanel
    A Swing-based UI panel that allows users to simulate buying and selling stocks in a visual trading environment.
    SimulatedTradeWindow
    SimulatedTradeWindow is a standalone window that embeds a SimulatedTradePanel inside a custom undecorated CustomWindowPanel.
    SimulationInput
    This class helps you retrieve values from the given input.
    Statistic
    This class is used to represent a Skeleton.Statistic.
    Statistics
    This class contains the set of statistics for an object in the simulation.
    StatisticsContainer
    Singleton object for all statistics.
    Stock
    The Stock class models a stock in a simulation, tracking its price and share history.
    StockMarket
    The StockMarket class is the core simulation engine for the stock trading environment.
    StockObserver
    The StockObserver interface should be implemented by any class that wants to be notified when the stock price is updated.
    TransactionStatistic
    A specialized statistic class that tracks transaction values and calculates the average value per transaction.
    Unit
    Abstract class that represents a unit in the simulation.
    WorkerStatistic
    Use this as a general class for holding Integer-based statistics.
